channel.title: Darth_afro56 Help Topic 2!
channel.description: Hello, my name is Darth_afro56 Owner Of Zozumascape, I consider myself Advanced in Java Programming. I have made Servers and applications. If you dont know what applications are well there sort of Handling Java Systems that can code not Only P servers but anything else. For example a Pop-Up. Im am currently admin on 13 Servers (Can't remember them all) Coder on 6 Servers and i'm player-mod on 0 Servers. Try posting any problems you might have encounterd and I will surely answer them my best. Oh and please dont get cocky if I dont answer for a while and i'm online. I might be watching Naruto. :P

item.title: Darth_afro56 Help Topic 2!
item.dc:creator: @this.sucks this.sucks();
item.description:
@this.sucks wrote:

StringBuilder sb1 = new StringBuilder(listOfFails);
StringBuilder sb2 = new StringBuilder(listOfEpicFails);
String listOfFails;
String listOfEpicFails;
void fail(String type, String object) {
	if (type.equals("Epic")) sb2.append(object); else sb1.append(object);
}
fail("Epic", "http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,47346.0.html");

item.title: Darth_afro56 Help Topic 2!
item.dc:creator: @Darth_Afro56 Darth_Afro56
item.description:
@Darth_Afro56 wrote:

kakia1:

how can i change max combat lvl??? plz tell me fast

Open client.java and search for:

		for (int lvl = 1;

Change it to:

for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 200; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0)); output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl; } } return 200; }

The Max Skill stat will be 200 and Max Combat Level will be 255.

Do the EXACT SAME thing in Player.java

Read full topic

item.title: Darth_afro56 Help Topic 2!
item.dc:creator: @Darth_Afro56 Darth_Afro56
item.description:
@Darth_Afro56 wrote:

Ok open Item2.java and add this above the last } in the file:

[code]public static int MyNpcDrop[] = {ITEM IDS GOES HERE (SEPARATE EACH WITH A COMMA};

public static int randomMyNpcDrop()
{
	return MyNpcDrop[(int)(Math.random()*MyNpcDrop.length)];
}[/code]

Change the MyNpcDrop to whatever u want to name the drop. and place the Item Ids. And separate them with a comma (,).

Then open NpcHandler.java and search for:

if(npcs[NPCID]

You should see sumtin like:

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 3494) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item3.randomFlam(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); }

Under that last } add this:

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == NPCIDGOESHERE) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item3.randomMyNpcDrop(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); }

Where it says NPCIDGOESHERE put the Id of the Npc. For example King black dragon = 50.
Again Change MyNpcDrop to whatever the drop is named. And Bingo!

Read full topic
